text: "The Answer Is Yes" is a 1992 song by Rodney Crowell for his album Life Is Messy. It was covered by Michelle Wright for her third single and fifth studio album For Me It's You. It went to number 4 on the Canadian Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Country songs Category:Rodney Crowell songs Category:Michelle Wright songs
title: The Answer Is Yes
